General.Name: EAC Invest A/S
General.Description: EAC Invest A/S operates as an investment company. It engages in production of acrylics in Thailand. The company was formerly known as Santa Fe Group A/S and changed its name to EAC Invest A/S in November 2019. EAC Invest A/S was founded in 1897 and is based in Copenhagen, Denmark.
